metadata.title: CVE-2017-17942 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
In LibTIFF 4.0.9, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the functionPackBitsEncode in tif_packbits.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6').
